about.title: About Shekhabo
about.subtitle: Shekhabo is an edtech platform for job seekers and fresh graduates. We connect you with industry experts who teach you the skills, hacks, and strategies that companies actually look for. Our promise is simple; Learn what you missed, master what you need. Step confidently into your career

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.intro: We noticed a gap: too many graduates have the degree, but lack the practical grasp of how the industry actually works. We believe that when you replace confusion with clarity, confidence follows naturally. Shekhabo was built to bridge that gap—helping you move from "just getting by" to mastering your craft and building a career you love.
ourStory.rippleEffect: Keeping that in mind, our goals include:

forLearners.title: For Learners
forLearners.description: To build genuine confidence by mastering practical skills instead of just memorizing theory, paving the way for faster career progression and job satisfaction

forEmployers.title: For Employers
forEmployers.description: To deliver job-ready professionals who can contribute from day one, reducing training costs and significantly boosting overall productivity

forSociety.title: For Society
forSociety.description: A more skilled workforce that drives innovation and economic growth, with individuals who are genuinely prepared for the modern workplace.

forEducation.title: For Education
forEducation.description: A complementary approach that bridges the gap between academic learning and practical application, making education more meaningful and effective.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We’re not here to replace universities. We’re here to complete what they started– to make sure people don’t just pass and walk out with a degree into the fray of the world. We want to make sure they thrive in the workplace We bridge the current gap between education and employment by focusing on what skills are valued in the industry, and building people up to be capable.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every graduate feels confident and prepared for their careers. Where the transition from education to employment is seamless, and where people can build careers they can truly be proud of through genuine understanding and mastery of their field.

different.title: How We're Different
different.subtitle: We don't just teach courses — we complete the learning journey. Here's what sets us apart:

needBased.title: Need-Based Learning
needBased.description: Instead of one-size-fits-all curricula, we focus on what learners actually need in their specific career paths.

professionals.title: Industry Professionals
professionals.description: Our instructors are professionals who have actually worked in the field, bringing real experience and insider knowledge.

actionOriented.title: Action-Oriented
actionOriented.description: Less theory, more action. Learners work on tasks they would actually face in their jobs, building practical competency.

noOneLeft.title: No One Left Behind
noOneLeft.description: Our step-by-step guidance ensures every learner understands before moving on, building confidence with each step.

failureManagement.title: Failure management – Turning Setbacks into Comebacks
failureManagement.subtitle: At Shekhabo, we know that failure happens and that's okay. Whether you don't pass an assessment, struggle with a topic, or fail to land a job, our team is here to put you back on track.

personalReview.title: Personal Review
personalReview.description: Our team analyzes your challenges with you to identify improvement areas.

extraSupport.title: Extra Support
extraSupport.description: We add short modules, targeted courses, or workshops to cover weak spots.

customRoadmap.title: Custom Roadmap
customRoadmap.description: Get a step-by-step recovery plan designed for your specific situation.

mentorship.title: 1-on-1 Mentorship
mentorship.description: Access personalized guidance from experts to rebuild confidence.

mindsetMotivation.title: Mindset & Motivation
mindsetMotivation.emphasis: failure is feedback, not the end.

industryWorkshops.title: Industry-Specific Workshops
industryWorkshops.subtitle: Every industry has unique hiring practices and hidden requirements. Our workshops prepare you with insider knowledge and tips.

unilever.title: Unilever Workshop
unilever.description: How to pass FMCG case competitions, aptitude tests and leadership rounds.

batb.title: BATB Workshop
batb.description: Insights from ex-employees on cracking MTO roles at British American Tobacco Bangladesh.

banking.title: Banking & Finance Bootcamp
banking.description: Training on aptitude, group discussions, and mock interviews for banking sector.

it.title: IT Industry Prep
it.description: Coding tests, portfolio reviews, and system design interviews for tech careers.

engineering.title: Engineering Career Pathways
engineering.description: Guidance for Civil, Mechanical, Electrical & Architecture students.

structuredRoadmaps.title: Structured Roadmaps
structuredRoadmaps.description: Clear guidelines and step-by-step career planning.

industrySpecificHacks.title: Industry-Specific Hacks
industrySpecificHacks.description: Land jobs faster with insider knowledge and strategies.

completeCareerJourney.title: Complete Career Journey
completeCareerJourney.description: From applying → Onboarding → Thriving in the role → switching jobs respectfully.

industryBuiltCourses.title: Industry-Built Courses
industryBuiltCourses.emphasis: with the industry, for the industry.

noOneLeftBehind.title: No One Left Behind
noOneLeftBehind.description: Our step-by-step guidance ensures every learner understands before moving on, building confidence with each step.

realWorld.title: Real-World Focus
realWorld.description: We believe in practical learning over theoretical memorization. Every lesson is designed around actual workplace scenarios and real challenges that learners will face in their careers.

personalized.title: Personalized Guidance
personalized.description: We understand that every learner is unique. Our approach identifies individual weaknesses and strengths, providing targeted support where it's needed most.

expertMentorship.title: Expert Mentorship
expertMentorship.description: Our instructors aren't just teachers — they're professionals who have lived the experience. They bring insider knowledge and real-world insights that textbooks can't provide.

confidenceBuilding.title: Confidence Building
confidenceBuilding.description: We believe that true understanding breeds confidence. When you genuinely master your skills, you don't just get a job — you excel in your career and build something meaningful.

problem.title: The Problem We Identified
problem.subtitle: This isn't because they're lazy. It's because the education system wasn't built to match the demands of the workplace.

theoryOverPractice.title: Theory Over Practice
theoryOverPractice.description: Students memorize enough to pass exams, but never really understand the subject or how to apply knowledge in real-world situations.

missingGuidance.title: Missing Guidance
missingGuidance.description: They skip practical projects because no one guides them properly, leaving crucial hands-on experience gaps that employers expect.

workplaceGap.title: Workplace Reality Gap
workplaceGap.description: Teaching focuses too much on theory and not enough on real-world application, leaving graduates unprepared for actual job demands.

impact.title: The Real Impact
impact.result: The result? Stress, frustration, lack of confidence, and slow career growth. And for companies, this means lower productivity and more time spent on training.
impact.gap: We saw talented individuals struggling not because they lacked potential, but because there was a fundamental gap between what they learned and what they needed to succeed in their careers.
impact.betterWay: We believe there's a better way.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.subtitle: That's why we created Shekhabo Ltd. — a platform designed to fill the gap between education and employment. We focus on what learners actually need in their specific careers, not just what's in a textbook.

personalizedLearning.title: Personalized Learning
personalizedLearning.description: Students identify exactly where they feel weak, and we match them with targeted lessons that address their specific needs and career goals.

expertInstructors.title: Expert Instructors
expertInstructors.description: Professionals who have actually worked in the field, teaching real-world skills and insider tips that you won't find in traditional textbooks.

practicalApproach.title: Practical Approach
practicalApproach.description: Less theory, more action. Learners work on tasks they would actually face in a job, building genuine workplace competency and confidence.

stepByStep.title: Step-by-Step Guidance
stepByStep.description: No one is left behind. Our instructors ensure every learner understands before moving on, building confidence with every step of the journey.

toLearners.title: To Our Learners
toLearners.description: We promise to provide practical, job-relevant skills taught by industry experts. We're committed to ensuring you don't just pass courses, but truly master the skills you need for career success.

toPartners.title: To Our Partners
toPartners.description: We work collaboratively with educational institutions and employers to create a more effective learning ecosystem that benefits everyone in the education-to-employment pipeline.

bcsPrep.title: BCS Preparation
bcsPrep.description: Comprehensive guidance and resources to prepare for Bangladesh Civil Service exams effectively.

mtoBanking.title: MTO & Banking
mtoBanking.description: Specialized preparation for Management Trainee Officer and banking sector recruitment processes.

bpoPrep.title: BPO Job Preparation
bpoPrep.description: Skill development for call centers and business process outsourcing roles, both local and international.

itIndustry.title: IT Industry
itIndustry.description: Training in essential IT skills and industry practices for a successful tech career.

careerGuidelines.title: Career Guidelines
careerGuidelines.description: Personalized career advice to help you choose the right path and achieve your goals.

engineering.title: Engineering (EEE, ME, Arch, Civil)
engineering.description: Practical skill training and project guidance for various engineering disciplines.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Shekhabo Ltd., we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.personal: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and educational background.
dataCollection.usage: Usage Data: How you interact with our platform, courses accessed, and learning progress.
dataCollection.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.service: To provide and improve our educational services
dataUse.communication: To communicate with you about courses and updates
dataUse.analytics: To analyze platform usage and improve our services

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.legal: When required by law or legal process
dataSharing.protection: To protect our rights and the safety of our users

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.deletion: Right to request deletion of your data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us

intro.title: Agreement to Terms
intro.content: By accessing and using Shekhabo Ltd., you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

services.title: Description of Service
services.content: Shekhabo Ltd. provides online educational courses, live classes, and career development resources. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service at any time.

userAccount.title: User Accounts
userAccount.registration: You must provide accurate and complete information during registration
userAccount.security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
userAccount.conduct: You agree to use the platform in accordance with all applicable laws

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.fees: Course fees are clearly stated and must be paid in advance
payment.refund: Refund policies are specific to each course and clearly communicated
payment.changes: We reserve the right to change pricing with appropriate notice

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.ownership: All content on Shekhabo Ltd. is our property or licensed to us
intellectual.restrictions: You may not copy, distribute, or modify our content without permission
intellectual.userContent: You retain ownership of content you create, but grant us license to use it

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content: You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or to violate any laws. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to:
prohibited.harassment: Harassment or abuse of other users

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Shekhabo Ltd. shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at teamshekhabo@gmail.com
